narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Salt River Pima-maricopa Indian Community is a Home Health provider based in Scottsdale, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $42.9M in Medicaid payments across 228K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $42.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
